title: WebPage Schema
description: A comprehensive JSON Schema for WebPage credentials that supports all page types using schema.org vocabulary.

id.description: The unique identifier for the web page, typically a URI.

schema:name.description: The name or title of the web page.

schema:description.description: A description of the web page.

schema:url.description: The URL of the web page.

schema:pageType.description: The specific type of web page. Defaults to 'WebPage' for generic pages.

oneOf.description: The URI of the author of the web page.

schema:author.description: The author of the web page.

oneOf.description: The URI of the creator of the web page.

schema:creator.description: The creator of the web page.

schema:dateCreated.description: The date and time when the web page was created.

schema:datePublished.description: The date and time when the web page was published.

schema:dateModified.description: The date and time when the web page was last modified.

schema:genre.description: The genre of the web page.

schema:keywords.description: Keywords or tags associated with the web page.

schema:license.description: The license under which the web page is distributed.

schema:inLanguage.description: The language of the web page (ISO 639-1 code).

schema:isAccessibleForFree.description: Whether the web page is accessible for free.

schema:thumbnailUrl.description: The URL of a thumbnail image for the web page.

schema:image.description: The URL of an image representing the web page.

schema:abstract.description: An abstract or summary of the web page.

schema:interactionType.description: The type of interaction being measured.

schema:interactionStatistic.description: Statistics about user interactions with the web page.

schema:isPartOf.description: The URI of the website of which this page is a part.

schema:mainEntity.description: The main entity described on the web page.

schema:mainEntityOfPage.description: Indicates a page for which this thing is the main entity being described.

schema:about.description: The subject matter of the web page.

schema:breadcrumb.description: A breadcrumb trail for the web page.

schema:lastReviewed.description: The date and time when the web page was last reviewed.

schema:reviewedBy.description: The reviewer of the web page.

schema:significantLink.description: One of the more significant URLs on the web page.

schema:relatedLink.description: A link related to this web page.

schema:primaryImageOfPage.description: The primary image of the web page.

schema:mainContentOfPage.description: The main content of the web page.

schema:specialty.description: One of the domain specialities to which this web page's content applies.

oneOf.description: The URI of speakable content on the web page.

schema:speakable.description: Indicates sections of the web page that are particularly 'speakable' for text-to-speech conversion.

schema:wordCount.description: The number of words in the web page.

schema:characterCount.description: The number of characters in the web page.

schema:pageStart.description: The page on which the work starts.

schema:pageEnd.description: The page on which the work ends.

schema:pagination.description: Any description of pages that is not separated into pageStart and pageEnd.

schema:isFamilyFriendly.description: Whether the web page is family friendly.

schema:dateLastReviewed.description: The date and time when the web page was last reviewed.

schema:accessMode.description: The human sensory perceptual system or cognitive faculty through which a person may process or perceive information.

schema:accessModeSufficient.description: A list of single or combined accessModes that are sufficient to understand all the intellectual content of a resource.

schema:accessibilityAPI.description: Indicates that the resource is compatible with the referenced accessibility API.

schema:accessibilityControl.description: Identifies input methods that are sufficient to fully control the described resource.

schema:accessibilityFeature.description: Content features of the resource, such as accessible media, alternatives and supported enhancements for accessibility.

schema:accessibilityHazard.description: A characteristic of the described resource that is physiologically dangerous to some users.

schema:accessibilitySummary.description: A human-readable summary of specific accessibility features or deficiencies.

oneOf.description: The URI of the accountable person.

id.description: The URI of the accountable person.

schema:name.description: The name of the accountable person.

schema:accountablePerson.description: Specifies the Person that is legally accountable for the CreativeWork.

oneOf.description: The URI of the aggregate rating.

schema:aggregateRating.description: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.

schema:alternativeHeadline.description: A secondary title of the CreativeWork.

schema:commentCount.description: The number of comments this CreativeWork has received.

oneOf.description: The URI of the content location.

schema:contentLocation.description: The location depicted or described in the content.

schema:contentRating.description: Official rating of a piece of content.

oneOf.description: The URI of the copyright holder.

id.description: The URI of the copyright holder.

schema:name.description: The name of the copyright holder.

schema:copyrightHolder.description: The party holding the legal copyright to the CreativeWork.

schema:copyrightYear.description: The year during which the claimed copyright for the CreativeWork was first asserted.

schema:editor.description: Specifies the Person who edited the CreativeWork.

schema:expires.description: Date the content expires and is no longer useful or available.

schema:publisher.description: The publisher of the article in question.

schema:text.description: The textual content of this CreativeWork.

oneOf.description: The URI of the thumbnail image.

id.description: The URI of the thumbnail image.

schema:name.description: The name of the thumbnail image.

schema:thumbnail.description: Thumbnail image for an image or video.

schema:timeRequired.description: Approximate or typical time it usually takes to work with or through the content of this work for the typical or target audience.

schema:version.description: The version of the CreativeWork embodied by a specified resource.

schema:identifier.description: The identifier property represents any kind of identifier for any kind of Thing.

schema:sameAs.description: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity.
